item.description:
June 2009

Agenda
* Introductions
* 15-Minute Reusable App Talk
* Speaker

15-Minute Reusable App Talk
Jonathan Stiebel will present django-registration and Pinax.

Speaker
Brett Stilwell will present Pecha Kucha Planet ( http://pechakuchaplan... ), a Django site.

Location
Betahouse, 13 Magazine St, Central Sq. If you are coming by car, you can park in the Green Street garage for $5. If coming by T, take the Red Line to Central Square and walk two blocks to 13 Magazine St. Buzz suite #2 and then walk up the stairs two flights.
item.how_to_find_us: brick building. third floor. walk all the way up the stairs.
item.name: Cambridge Django June 2009 Meetup
